psf_scripts.deconvolution_script module¶

PSF DECONVOLUTION SCRIPT

This module is executable and contains methods for deconvolving a set of observed galaxy images.

Author:Samuel Farrens <samuel.farrens@gmail.com>
Version:3.1
Date:12/12/2016
psf_scripts.deconvolution_script.check_data_format(data)[source]¶

Check data format

This method checks that the input data is correctly formatted.

Parameters:

data : np.ndarray

Input data array
psf_scripts.deconvolution_script.main()[source]¶
psf_scripts.deconvolution_script.run_script(log)[source]¶

Run script

This method runs the script.

Parameters:

log : logging.Logger

Log instance
psf_scripts.deconvolution_script.set_out_string()[source]¶

Set output string

This method checks if an output string has been specified and if not creates and ouput string from the input string and the mode

psf_scripts.deconvolution_script.test_deconvolution(deconv_data)[source]¶

Test deconvolution

This method tests the quality of the deconvolved images.

Parameters:

deconv_data : np.ndarray

Deconvolved data
Returns:

np.ndarray pixel errors, np.ndarray ellipticity errors
